casebody.data:
Jonathan E. BRUNSON, Plaintiff,
v.
OFFICE OF THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY FOR THE 12 PROSECUTORIAL DISTRICT, Office of the Magistrate for Cumberland County, Office of the 12 Judiciary, the Office of the Cumberland County Sheriff, North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services, North Carolina Department of Social Services, North Carolina Department of Justice, North Carolina Department of Public Safety, North Carolina Department of Human Resources, and the State of North Carolina, Defendants. No. COA18-568 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 18, 2018

TH

th

DISMISSED.
